<<<<<<< HEAD
Saving-beliefe: or, The ready and right vvay to beleeve and be saved Wherein is the * mysterie of faith laid open * I Tim. 3. 9. By Timothy Rogers, minister of the Gospel (twixt Essex and Suffolke) in Sudbury. Rogers, Timothy, 1598-1650?.
[8], 183, [1] p.
printed by G.M. for Edward Brewster at the Bible on Fleet-bridge, London : 1644.
The words "* I Tim. 3. 9." on title page are enclosed in square brackets. Includes contents. Imprimatur leaf (A4v) dated: August. 12. 1644. Caption title on p. 1 reads: Saving belief: or, The ready and right way to beleeve and be saved. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[8], 183, [1] p.
printed by G.M. for Edward Brewster at the Bible on Fleet-bridge, London : 1644.
The words "* I Tim. 3. 9." on title page are enclosed in square brackets. Includes contents. Imprimatur leaf (A4v) dated: August. 12. 1644. Caption title on p. 1 reads: Saving belief: or, The ready and right way to beleeve and be saved. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Edward Brewster
